name: Battle Birds (thesweetestdee)
description:
This is work in progress, please leave any questions or comments below.

Battle Birds is a re-imagined classic, owing its roots to games like Warhawk and Starhawk. Like those games it will feature a variety of weapons and vehicles, as well as maps for small-scale and large-scale air and land combat.

The game is multiplayer only. Feel free to share copies.

The game is free and accepting donations while in development. The full version will likely be as well, as I am mostly just doing this for fun.

Want to join the project? Send me a message!
